meanings.sent1: The subminiature toy car easily fits in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: The subminiature camera is perfect for capturing close-up shots.
meanings.sent3: I felt like a giant holding the subminiature umbrella during the rainstorm.
meanings.sent4: Her subminiature earrings were like tiny drops of silver dangling from her ears.
meanings.sent5: The subminiature flowers in the garden added a delicate touch to the landscape.

meanings.definition: A very small version of something.
meanings.sent1: The jeweler crafted a beautiful subminiature replica of the Eiffel Tower.
meanings.sent2: She collected subminiature figurines of animals from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The chef created a subminiature cake that was too cute to eat.
meanings.sent4: The subminiature model of the airplane was displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a subminiature portrait on a tiny canvas.
